eventDecorators.name: Claimed
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when setting contract parameters.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when setting contract parameters.

eventDecorators.name: Withrawn
eventDecorators.description: Event for token purchase logging. Emitted when setting contract parameters.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: get the revenue's balance of account.

functionDecorators.name: claimShare
functionDecorators.description: Claim the share proportional to the total of supplied male and female tokens according to the restricted condition.

functionDecorators.name: endUpdate
functionDecorators.description: End updating when you are oracle provider.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: startUpdate
functionDecorators.description: Set starting update since right now when you are oracle provider.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: updateListing
functionDecorators.description: Update the token's listing status for sale on OpenSea.
